headline: Greg Adelson Appointed to Jack Henry Board of Directors
summary: Jack Henry & Associates Inc.® (Nasdaq: JKHY) today announced the appointment of President and CEO Greg Adelson to its Board of Directors on August 22, 2025. This appointment coincides with the expansion of the company's Board from nine to 10 directors.
